mapper.sql: yyyymmdd, sh_lup10_count, sz_lup10_count, sh_lup10ag_count, sz_lup10ag_count, sh_lup10nc_count, sz_lup10nc_count, sh_lup10l2_count, sz_lup10l2_count, sh_lup10l3_count, sz_lup10l3_count, sh_lup10l4_count, sz_lup10l4_count, sh_lup10l5_count, sz_lup10l5_count, sh_ldw10_count, sz_ldw10_count, sh_ldw10nc_count, sz_ldw10nc_count, sh_ldw10l2_count, sz_ldw10l2_count, sh_ldw10l3_count, sz_ldw10l3_count, sh_ldw10l4_count, sz_ldw10l4_count, sh_ldw10l5_count, sz_ldw10l5_count, sh_lud10_count, sz_lud10_count, sh_stock_count, sz_stock_count, b.close as sh_index_000001, c.close as sz_index_399001
mapper.select:
select a.date as yyyymmdd, a.close as sh_close, a.volume/100 as sh_volume, a.change as sh_change, b.close as sz_close, b.volume/100 as sz_volume, b.change as sz_change from d_trade_index_sh000001 a, d_trade_index_sz399001 b where a.date >= '2000-01-01' and a.date = b.date order by a.date
limit #{pageStartPos}, #{pageSize}
select yyyymmdd, icon_name, event_name, event_memo from d_event_milestone where yyyymmdd in (select `date` from d_trade_index_sh000001) order by yyyymmdd, event_name

select `date` as yyyymmdd, `close`, `volume`/100 as volume, `change` from d_trade_index_sz399006 where `date` >= '2000-01-01' order by `date`
limit #{pageStartPos}, #{pageSize}

select substr(`date`, 1, 4) as 'yyyy', week(date, 5) as 'week', 0 as 'stockcount' from `d_trade_index_sh000001` where date >= '2000-01-01' group by substr(`date`, 1, 4), week(date, 5) order by substr(`date`, 1, 4), week(date, 5)

select stocktype, `yyyy`, `week`, count(1) as stockcount from ( select case substr(code, 1,1) when '6' then '上证' when '0' then '深证' when '3' then '创业' end as 'stocktype' , substr(timeToMarket, 1, 4) as 'yyyy' , week(timeToMarket, 5) as 'week' from d_stock_basics where timeToMarket >= '20000101' ) data group by stocktype, `yyyy`, `week` order by stocktype, `yyyy`, `week`

select cal_date as trade_date, sum(up10) as up10, sum(up10nc) as up10nc , sum(down10) as down10, sum(down10nc) as down10nc , sum(updown12) as updown12 , sum(up10down) as up10down, sum(down10up) as down10up , sum(up10d2) as up10d2, sum(up10d3) as up10d3, sum(up10d4) as up10d4, sum(up10d5) as up10d5 , sum(down10d2) as down10d2, sum(down10d3) as down10d3, sum(down10d4) as down10d4, sum(down10d5) as down10d5 , sum(updouble25d) as updouble25d, sum(downdouble25d) as downdouble25d from ( select b.cal_date, case when data_type = 'up10' then 1 else 0 end as up10, case when data_type = 'up10nc' then 1 else 0 end as up10nc , case when data_type = 'down10' then 1 else 0 end as down10, case when data_type = 'down10nc' then 1 else 0 end as down10nc , case when data_type = 'updown12' then 1 else 0 end as updown12 , case when data_type = 'up10down' then 1 else 0 end as up10down, case when data_type = 'down10up' then 1 else 0 end as down10up , case when data_type = 'up10d2' then 1 else 0 end as up10d2, case when data_type = 'up10d3' then 1 else 0 end as up10d3 , case when data_type = 'up10d4' then 1 else 0 end as up10d4, case when data_type = 'up10d5' then 1 else 0 end as up10d5 , case when data_type = 'down10d2' then 1 else 0 end as down10d2, case when data_type = 'down10d3' then 1 else 0 end as down10d3 , case when data_type = 'down10d4' then 1 else 0 end as down10d4, case when data_type = 'down10d5' then 1 else 0 end as down10d5 , case when data_type = 'updouble25d' then 1 else 0 end as updouble25d, case when data_type = 'downdouble25d' then 1 else 0 end as downdouble25d from d2_trade_cal b left join d2_analyse_everyday_detail a on (a.trade_date = b.cal_date) where b.exchange_id = 'SSE' and b.is_open = 1 ) dt group by cal_date order by cal_date
select `trade_date`, `open`, `close`, `high`, `low`, `change`, `pct_change`, `vol`, `amount` from d2_index_daily where `ts_code` = #{ts_code} and `trade_date` >= '20000101' order by trade_date
select `trade_date`, `open`, `close`, `settle`, `high`, `low`, `vol`, `amount` from d2_fut_daily where `ts_code` = #{ts_code} order by trade_date

select b.`trade_date`, b.`open`, b.`close`, b.`high`, b.`low`, b.`change`, b.`pct_change`, b.`vol`, b.`amount` from (select left(`trade_date`, 4) as 'yyyy', `ts_code`, min(`trade_date`) as 'trade_date' from d2_index_daily where `ts_code` = #{ts_code} and `trade_date` >= '20000101' group by `ts_code`, left(`trade_date`, 4)) a, d2_index_daily b where a.`ts_code` = b.`ts_code` and a.`trade_date` = b.`trade_date` order by b.`trade_date`

select a.trade_date, round(a.close, 2) as sh_close, round(a.turnover_rate, 2) as sh_turnover_rate, round(a.total_mv, 2) as sh_total_mv, round(b.close, 2) as sz_close, round(b.turnover_rate, 2) as sz_turnover_rate, round(b.total_mv, 2) as sz_total_mv from d2_analyse_everyday_total a, d2_analyse_everyday_total b where a.ts_type = 'SH' and b.ts_type = 'SZ' and a.trade_date = b.trade_date order by a.trade_date

select a.trade_date, round(a.rzye/100000000,2) as 'sh_rzye', round(b.rzye/100000000,2) as 'sz_rzye', round(a.rqye/100000000,2) as 'sh_rqye', round(b.rqye/100000000,2) as 'sz_rqye' from d2_margin a, d2_margin b where a.exchange_id='SSE' and b.exchange_id='SZSE' and a.trade_date = b.trade_date order by a.trade_date

select b.trade_date, round(sum(a.ggt_ss),2) as 'ggt_ss', round(sum(a.ggt_sz),2) as 'ggt_sz', round(sum(a.hgt),2) as 'hgt', round(sum(a.sgt),2) as 'sgt', round(sum(a.north_money),2) as 'north_money', round(sum(a.south_money),2) as 'south_money' from d2_moneyflow_hsgt a, d2_moneyflow_hsgt b where b.trade_date >= a.trade_date group by b.trade_date
select `ts_code`, `name` from d2_fut_basic where `ts_code` like concat('%', #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or `name` like concat('%', #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
